file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 38-10-01-04 - WATER TANK - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL WATER TANK - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures for the removal/installation of the lavatory water tank. B. The lavatory water tank is located in the lavatory installation, in the passenger cabin of the aircraft, zones 271 and 272. C. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ALL 38-10-01-000-801-A WATER TANK - REMOVAL ALL 38-10-01-400-801-A WATER TANK - INSTALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 38-10-01 Page 1 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 38-10-01-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. WATER TANK - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the procedures for the removal of the water tank assembly. B. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable C. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable D. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Rubber Gloves Plumbing Removal AR available E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Performs the task Passenger cabin H. Preparation SUBTASK 841-003-A (1) Make sure water tank is empty. (2) Disconnect all water supply lines to water tank. I. Removal of the Water Tank Assembly (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-003-A (1) Remove the cabinet mirror assembly (19). (2) Disassemble the water tank assembly as follows: (a) Remove the mounting bracket (1) with the nuts (2) and the washers (3). (b) Remove the mounting bracket (4) with the nuts (5) and the washers (6). (c) (AIRCRAFT WITH 36 LITERS TANK) Remove the mounting bracket (12) with the nuts (14) and the washers (13). (d) Remove the vent valve (7). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 38-10-01 Page 2 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (e) Remove the mounting brackets (9) with the nuts (10) and the washers (11). (f) Remove the tank assembly (8). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 38-10-01 Page 3 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

B 4. MOUNTING BRACKET 6. WASHER 5. NUT 11. WASHER 10. NUT 2. NUT 3. WASHER 1. MOUNTING 8. TANK ASSY BRACKET 7. VENT VALVE 9. MOUNTING BRACKET 11. WASHER 10. NUT 12. MOUNTING BRACKET 13. WASHER 14. NUT 4. MOUNTING BRACKET 6. WASHER 1 AIRCRAFT WITH 20 LITERS TANK DET. B 2 2 5. NUT AIRCRAFT WITH 36 LITERS TANK 145AMM380118.MCE EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 38-10-01 Page 5 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 38-10-01-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. WATER TANK - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedures for the installation of the water tank assembly. B. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable C. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable D. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Performs the task Passenger cabin H. Installation of the Water Tank Assembly (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-003-A (1) Assemble the water tank assembly as follows: (a) Install the vent valve (7) on the tank assembly (8). (b) Install the mounting brackets (9) with the nuts (10) and the washers (11). (c) Install the mounting bracket (4) and secure with the nuts (5) and the washers (6). (d) (AIRCRAFT WITH 36 LITERS TANK) Install the mounting bracket (12) and secure with the nuts (14) and the washers (13). (e) Install the mounting bracket (1) with the nuts (2) and the washers (3). (2) Install the water tank assembly in the lavatory. (3) Install the cabinet mirror assembly (19). I. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-003-A (1) Connect all water supply lines to the water tank. (2) Fill the water tank and inspect for leaks. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 38-10-01 Page 6 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
